name: Universal Timeline Manager
description: Auto-generate chronological playlists for multiple cinematic universes (Marvel, DC, Star Wars, etc.) based on JSON configuration files. Supports mixed content types and Provider_ID matching for accurate content identification.
overview: Creates and maintains chronological playlists for cinematic universes with support for movies and TV episodes, using TMDB/IMDB Provider_IDs for accurate content matching.

versions.changelog: Initial release with support for multiple universes, mixed content types, Provider_ID matching, and comprehensive error handling.
